summary:
South Carolina is a state in the southeast United States. It borders North Carolina, the Atlantic Ocean, and Georgia. With a population of over 5 million, it is the 24th most populous state. The capital is Columbia, and Charleston is the largest city.

Named after King Charles I, it was one of the original 13 colonies and became a state in 1788. It played a significant role in the American Revolution and was the first state to secede from the Union during the Civil War.

The state has a diverse economy, including aerospace, agriculture, and tourism. Its geography ranges from coastal plains to the Blue Ridge Mountains.
title: South Carolina
